sentence: Staff was very friendly and helpful at all times Maid service was top notch Bed was comfortable nice large refridgerator in room room was clean Club Lounge amenities and the included breakfast was top notch and a short walk to a very cool part of town
The crew is very attentive and makes your accommodations spectacular
accommodations were clean but in need of some serious updating
I attended an evening reception followed by a full day business meeting
PET FRIENDLY FACILITY
There was a Halloween pumpkin carving context in the lobby that hotel staff were completing in and guests voted on their favorite pumpkin
Restaurant bar on premises with pool gym as well
The gym looks like it is got an update and impressed me with the variety of equipment
However the staff was very courteous and the hotel and amenities were extremely clean
Great accommodations especially the club
I was on the second floor which had access to the gym and pool although I did not use those facilities
Meeting room was in the basement and somewhat dank and warm Elevators were extremely slow
The rooms are nice but the hallways are kept very dark like a scene from a horror movie
An unpleasant smell came from underneath the elevators
